MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH53 postcode area of Livingston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:12pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate a fault on the electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:56 PM on Thursday, 21 January 2021.
